short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves the deafult Blocking system on fxp.co.il

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Hide threads from blocked users.
- Completely Hide comments from blocked users.
- Be able to block moderators and supervisors.
- Custom settings.
- Block notifications.
- Much more to come!
